Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Bear jug
Description: Bear jug that might not have been used because the foot is solid and very thick. The body is biconical, the mouth is neckless, restricted and bordered with a flat lip. The clay is coarse, buff-coloured, heterogeneous, polished.
